text: "Enola Gay" is a 1980 song by British band Orchestal Manoeuvres in the Dark and was the only single from their second studio album Organisation. It went to number 8 in the United Kingdom, number 1 in Spain, Portugal and Italy, number 14 in Ireland, number 31 in New Zealand, number 6 in France and number 47 in Australia. ==Track listing== ===1980 original release=== The 12" single contained the same tracks as on the 7". ===2003 remix 12"=== ===2020 re- release 12"=== ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Synth-pop songs Category:Orchestral Manoeuvres in the Dark songs Category:Howard Jones songs Category:LGBT songs
title: Enola Gay (song)
